tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE firmware_updates (
    firmware_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    firmware_version VARCHAR(50),
    update_date TIMESTAMP,
    update_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE firmware_updates (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    update_version VARCHAR,
    update_date TIMESTAMP,
    status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE patch_management (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id UUID,
    patch_version VARCHAR,
    patch_date TIMESTAMP,
    update_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
    device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    model_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    firmware_version VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patch_management (
    patch_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    update_id INT NOT NULL,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    patch_date DATE NOT NULL,
    patch_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE firmware_updates (
   id serial PRIMARY KEY,
   device_id INT NOT NULL,
   update_version VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
   update_date DATE NOT NULL,
   status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE devices (
   device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   os_version VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
   last_update_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE compliance_logs (
   log_id serial PRIMARY KEY,
   device_id INT NOT NULL,
   log_date DATE NOT NULL,
   log_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   description TEXT
);
